name: Freddy Fazbear's: New Pizzeria Simulator
description:
A new Pizzeria of Freddy Fazbear!

This game is a new simulator of a pizzeria!, is a direct continuation of Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Simulator.

Here you can maintain your own pizzeria, put your own items, and more!

(JUMPSCARES NOT GUARANTEED TO NOT APPEAR)

The game i currently on Beta so is not completed, but with the time i will add more features and things!
